content:
I found Akos blog while I was researching software testing and I 100% recommend his blog to anyone looking to improve their coding skills.
Every article is well explained with clear code examples and overall the blog provides a very solid reference for learning.
author: Jorge de La Fuente
title: Frontend Software Engineer

content: ... the questions you asked to the reader was make them to reflect on themselves. And yeah, one of my favorite parts was how the article provided suggestions for improvement.

title: Full-stack Developer

content: Your vastness in tech have been incredibly helpful, and it is definitely sth to be talked about
